dialog: This porcelain is of the finest quality, renowned for its delicate eggshell texture.
It must be highly prized indeed.
But it's worth every galleon, I assure you.
Greetings, Miao Li. Where might you be headed?
Hello, I'm off to the apothecary to purchase some fruits.
Ah, would you do me a favor, if you wouldn't mind?
Of course, what can I assist you with?
Would you mind posting this letter for me on your way to the apothecary?
Of course. Would you like it sent via owl post or with a wizarding postage stamp?
Yes, I believe a wizarding postage stamp would be best. There are some important photographs enclosed and I wouldn't want them to go astray.
No problem, I would be happy to send your letter for you.
Many thanks.
You're welcome.
I seem to have misplaced my wand-phone in my broomstick. It's likely on the floor on the passenger side. Would you mind retrieving it for me so I can contact the Ministry of Magic?
Of course, I will retrieve it for you.
It appears to be damaged beyond repair. I fear I must go to St. Mungo's. Can you take me there?
I think it might be best to make a report to the Ministry of Magic first. Then we can proceed to St. Mungo's.
Blast it! I'm injured here. The Ministry could take all day to arrive!

I'm afraid you'll just have to be patient. I won't move my broomstick until the Ministry arrives. I'll pop into one of these nearby wizarding homes and use their fireplace to contact them. Don't worry, you'll make it to St. Mungo's in time.
It hurts quite badly.
